attributes.action: Change the system there's mother's who take csa but use it for shopping sprees
attributes.additional_details: Mothers buying shoes,bags,makeup,clothes  holidays,cars all on income support yet the children are in the same shoes same clothes month in month out there are some mothers out there who are fleecing fathers for there own benefit for me its becoming impossible to find motivation to work knowing that the money doesent go on my children. I'm sure there's many others in this position that would like a system that benefits the kids and not there ex partner.
attributes.background: As a father I'm happy to pay my way for my children however for the last year I've seen how badly fathers are in need of help, when it comes to earnings the CSA want evidence with payslips, they want updating on a regular basis to make sure calculation is correct, what proof do mothers give?

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
